summary.snippet: "Great food, great service, great people, music is on point."
"Great freaking burgers, and the price is cheap for the quality."
"Favorite dishes: onion rings, chicken herba wrap, fries etc."

most_relevant.description: Tried burger one for the first time today and was really impressed! The price is comparable to other burger chains but the service and quality is way above average. Compliments to the server - she was very clear, quick, and proactive. Also compliments to the cooks - the burger and fries were 10/10 not greasy and perfectly done. Will definitely be back!

I have tried Burger One many times by now either for dine in or take out. It’s always delicious and good quality food and great portions for the price. I have tried several of their burgers such as Burger 1 special, moss burger, chapo and crispy chicken burgers. All absolutely delicious. Phily cheese steak sandwich was great. I always order chicken wings here and they are juicy and delicious. Chicken tenders are very juicy and well seasoned as well. I am sensitive to chicken smell and love this place’s chickens. Also all meat is halal at this place!

Chicken burger 🫶🏻 and Oreo shake 🥤, I could have this all day, every day. My best friend loves this place; he comes here and eats once every week, and if I miss going with him, he often gets me an Oreo shake 🥤.
We ran across this place two weeks ago and decided we wanted to come try different things on the menu. Food is delicious. Service is friendly. And the atmosphere is nice.

Ginny our server was wonderful. There was a bunch of us in the group. She was patient and helpful. For a few of us it was our first time here. She was great. We ordered Cajun fries for the table. I’m not a fan of Cajun fries but everyone else enjoyed them. I was pressured into trying one. They were good. I just went with regular fries. Must of the group and the burger 1. It was topped with American Cheese, Mozzerella Sticks, Coleslaw, Turkey Bacon, Onion Rings, and Burger 1 Sauce. Holy moly! I had the Arbor burger. It was topped with Lettuce, Tomato, American, Swiss, Monterey Jack Cheese, Turkey Bacon, Fried Egg, Mayo, Ketchup, Pickles on A Brioche Bun. My wife had the ranch  wrap on a tomato basil wrap topped with Lettuce, Tomato, Pickles, Mayo, Turkey Bacon, Ranch, American Cheese. Excellent restaurant. Very enjoyable.

If you are looking for a great burger or patty melt look no further. I have been here twice now and both times the quality was consistently excellent.

I've tried the Chapo burger and now the Patty Melt. I also got the East Coast fries this time. My girlfriend got the Patty Melt with American cheese and Burger 1 sauce.

Easy easy easy recommendation for a burger. Worth the trip out to the area if you've got a craving.

We paid just under $30 for two patty melts, side of fries, side of east coast fries and one pop. It is slightly more than you might expect for that but the quality more than makes up for it.

I'm posting this from my car just after leaving because it was so great. I will be back again soon!

I am visiting Ann Arbor, Michigan for the first time and I really enjoyed my dining experience at Burger One. We recieved excellent service by Ginny and our Chapo's Burger, Southwest wrap and nuggets tasted amazing! Must visit if you're in town, highly recommend! ✨

Food was amazing. Probably the most delicious burger I've ever had. The burger 1, arbor super burger, and east coast fries
Ginny was very helpful with her recommendations and she was very nice
